title: Add task checklist selection during case creation

requirements.text: Add checkboxes to the case creation form for seven task items: Discharge Notes (default checked), pDVM Notified (default checked), Labs (default unchecked), Histo (default unchecked), Surgery Report (default unchecked), Imaging (default unchecked), Culture (default unchecked)

quotes: when adding the case; each item will have a check box; Discharge Notes (default yes) pDVM Notified (default yes) Labs (default no) Histo (default no) Surgery Report (default no) Imaging (default no) Culture (default no)

acceptanceCriteria: Case creation form displays all seven task checkboxes
Discharge Notes and pDVM Notified are checked by default
Labs, Histo, Surgery Report, Imaging, and Culture are unchecked by default
User can toggle any checkbox before submitting the case

requirements.text: Store only the tasks that were checked during case creation in the case data structure

quotes: Each item you check when creating the case will appear on the case card

acceptanceCriteria: Backend SurgeryCase type stores only the selected tasks
Unchecked tasks during creation are not stored in the case
Selected tasks are persisted correctly when creating a new case

requirements.text: Display only the tasks that were selected during case creation on the case card as open checkboxes that can be marked as complete

quotes: Each item you check when creating the case will appear on the case card as an open check box that still needs to be done

acceptanceCriteria: Case card shows only the tasks that were selected during creation
Each displayed task appears as an unchecked checkbox initially
Tasks not selected during creation do not appear on the case card
Users can check off tasks as they complete them

constraints: Maintain compatibility with existing case data structure and checklist system
Preserve the current task completion tracking functionality
Do not modify the ChecklistEditor component location or read-only UI components
nonGoals: Changing the list of available task types
Adding ability to modify task list after case creation
